scripts.open:android: adb shell monkey -p host.exp.exponent -c android.intent.category.LAUNCHER --pct-syskeys 0 1 || adb shell am start -n host.exp.exponent/.experience.HomeActivity
scripts.open:android:url: adb shell am start -a android.intent.action.VIEW -d "exp://10.0.2.2:8081" host.exp.exponent
scripts.open:ios: node -e "const {execSync}=require('child_process'); const j=JSON.parse(execSync('xcrun simctl list -j devices available',{stdio:['ignore','pipe','ignore']}).toString()); const dev=Object.values(j.devices).flat().find(d=>d.isAvailable && /^iPhone/.test(d.name)); if(!dev){console.error('No available iPhone simulator found. Open Xcode → Settings → Platforms to install a simulator.'); process.exit(1);} if(dev.state!=='Booted'){execSync('xcrun simctl boot '+dev.udid,{stdio:'inherit'});} execSync('open -a Simulator'); console.log('Using',dev.name,dev.udid);"
